post.author: Admin
post.title: Concessions Info For This Friday
post.description:
Dear Band Families,
Regarding concessions for this Friday, Oct. 20, Senior Band night:
please
post.content:
Dear Band Families,

Regarding concessions for this Friday, Oct. 20, Senior Band night:

  1. please check if you are signed up, this was done in March and knowledge of Senior Night may not have been listed, and life changes
  2. We are in need of a couple more volunteers this week please consider meeting new members of this great band family and maybe new friends
  3. Please if for ANY reason your availability changes, especially this week if your a Senior family, please visit the Booster website "volunteer now" page then scroll down to concession and make necessary changes, to your availability, please. This ensures others can see where help is needed and there are enough volunteers to cover all positions.

Thank you in advance for your help!!

Keep Smiling, Dawn Rembowski
